name: DARK WATER
description:
'DARK WATER’ is a game about the adventure of a granddaughter and grandmother to save the village from an attack by cursed slimes.
Using the various actions and jumps that use a bow, save the village in danger by breaking through the enemies and traps.
Attack: Once learned a specific ability, time flows slowly during an attack in the air.
Teleportation arrow: Teleport to the point where you want by aiming the teleportation arrow.
The white mark is the points where you can teleportation, the red mark is the points where you can not teleportation.
Hanging: Stamina is used up while hanging on stuff or walls, and if used up all, ’Hanging’ will be released.
Parachute: Once learned a specific skill, the grandmother can descend slowly from the air.
